Name: The CLASSLA-Stanza model for morphosyntactic annotation of standard Bulgarian 2.1
Description: The model for morphosyntactic annotation of standard Bulgarian was built with the CLASSLA-Stanza tool by training on the BulTreeBank training corpus and using the CLARIN.SI-embed.bg word embeddings. The model produces simultaneously UPOS, FEATS and XPOS (MULTEXT-East) labels. The estimated F1 of the XPOS annotations is ~96.83. The model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
